name: Please Like This Game
description:
Join the antics of The Cinnamon Synonym, YouTuber-extraordinaire, as he attempts to make a joke by spending 10+ hours making a self-mocking game! How will the player escape from this Hell? 

This is a fully completed game, with everything a gamer could ever ask for! Such as:

- TWO ENDINGS!

- MUSIC!

- CATS!

- AND A LOT OF SELF MOCKERY! 

Please... like this game. 

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

You can watch the original video here: [TBA]

Special thanks to Gamejam: The Gamejam Game for some of the assets and the reason why this game exists: https://js-turunen.itch.io/gamejam-the-gamejam-game

If you like zany gaming videos, consider subscribing to The Cinnamon Synonym on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-Fhc8KyC0DD_liKCUZFJiQ
